TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BaseAddressPrefixFilterElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class BaseAddressPrefixFilterElement Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 表示指定通過篩選條件的組態元素，如此便提供一項機制，可在將 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 應用程式裝載於 IIS 時挑選適當的 IIS 繫結。

span.span: Represents a configuration element that specifies a pass through filter, which provides a mechanism to pick the appropriate IIS bindings when hosting a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) application in IIS.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前置詞篩選條件可提供讓服務繫結至特定 URI 的機制。它可讓您在同一個網站上裝載多個應用程式，而且同一個配置中可以有不同的基底位址。A prefix filter provider a mechanism for a service to bind to a specific URI .It enables you to host multiple applications with different base addresses for the same scheme on the same site. IIS 網站是包含虛擬目錄的虛擬應用程式的容器。IIS websites are containers for virtual applications which contain virtual directories. 網站中的應用程式則可以透過一個或多個 IIS 繫結來存取。The application in a site can be accessed through one or more IIS binding. IIS 繫結提供繫結通訊協定和繫結這兩項資訊。IIS bindings provide two pieces of information: binding protocol and binding information. 繫結通訊協定 (例如，HTTP) 定義的配置在其上進行通訊，而繫結資訊 （例如 IPAddress、 連接埠、 Hostheader） 包含用來存取網站的資料。Binding protocol (for example, HTTP) defines the scheme over which communication occurs, and binding information (for example, IPAddress, Port, Hostheader) contains data used to access the site. IIS 支援為每個網站指定多個 IIS 繫結，讓每個配置能夠有多個基底位址。IIS supports specifying multiple IIS bindings per site, which results in multiple base addresses per scheme. 因為在網站下裝載的 WCF 服務可讓繫結至一個基底位址，每個配置，您可以使用前置詞篩選功能挑選裝載服務所需的基底位址。Since a WCF service hosted under a site allows binding to only one base address per scheme, you can use the prefix filter feature to pick the required base address of the hosted service. IIS 提供的傳入基底位址會依據選擇性的前置詞清單篩選條件進行篩選。The incoming base addresses, supplied by IIS, are filtered based on the optional prefix list filter. 例如，您的網站可能包含下列基底位址：For example, your site can contain the following base addresses ``` http://testl.fabrikam.com/Service.svc http://test2.fabrikam.com/Service.svc ``` 您可以使用下列組態檔在 appdomain 層級指定前置詞篩選條件。You can use the following configuration file to specify a prefix filter at the appdomain level. ```                   ``` 在此範例中，`net.tcp://test1.fabrikam.com:8000` 和 `http://test2.fabrikam.com:9000` 分別是其配置的唯一基底位址，而且已被允許通過篩選。In this example, `net.tcp://test1.fabrikam.com:8000` and `http://test2.fabrikam.com:9000` are the only base addresses for their respective schemes which are allowed to be passed through. 根據預設，如果沒有指定前置詞，則所有位址都會通過。By default, when prefix is not specified, all addresses are passed through. 如果指定前置詞，將造成只有符合該配置的基底位址能夠通過篩選。Specifying the prefix will result in only the matching base address for that scheme to be passed through. > [!NOTE] > 篩選條件不支援任何萬用字元。The filter does not support any wildcards. 此外，IIS 提供的 baseAddress 中，可能會有位址繫結至不在 `baseAddressPrefixFilters` 清單中的配置，In addition, the baseAddresses supplied by IIS may have addresses bound to other schemes not present in the `baseAddressPrefixFilters` list. 而且這些位址尚未經過篩選。These addresses are not filtered out.

param.name: prefix
param.span: 篩選條件，可令服務在以此特定前置詞開頭的所有 URI 上接聽。

span.span: A filter that causes the service to listen on all URIs that start with this specific prefix.

summary.span: 使用特定 URI 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specific URI.

summary.span: 取得或設定用於比對部分基底位址的前置詞。

span.span: Gets or sets a prefix that is used to match a part of a base address.

value.span: URI，這個 URI 可用來比對基底位址的一部分。

span.span: A URI that is used to match a part of a base address.
